text: The Diocese of Kerry () is a Roman Catholic diocese in south-western Ireland. It is one of six suffragan dioceses in the ecclesiastical province of Cashel (also known as Munster) and is subject to the Archbishop of Cashel and Emly.Diocese of Kerry. Catholic-Hierarchy. Retrieved 3 June 2011. The diocese was established in the early 12th century as the "Diocese of Ardfert and Aghadoe". It changed its name to the "Diocese of Kerry" on 20 December 1952.Diocese of Kerry. Catholic Hierarchy. Retrieved on 22 March 2009. The cathedral church of the diocese is St Mary's Cathedral in Killarney. ==Geography== The diocese contains most of County Kerry and parts of County Cork, including the towns of Cahersiveen, Dingle, Killarney, Killorglin, Listowel, Millstreet and Tralee. ==Bishop of Kerry== The incumbent, Raymond Browne, was appointed by Pope Francis on 2 May 2013http://attualita.vatican.va/sala- stampa/bollettino/2013/05/02/news/30918.html and was consecrated on 21 July 2013 by his then metropolitan, Dermot Clifford. ==Pastoral Areas and Parishes== The Diocese is divided into twelve pastoral areas (previously deaneries), each of which are in turn divided into a number of parishes or group parishes: * Corca Dhuibhne Pastoral Area – Annascaul Ballyferriter Castlegregory Dingle. * Tralee Pastoral Area – Spa St Brendan's St John's. * St Brendan's Pastoral Area – Abbeydorney Ardfert Ballyheigue Causeway & Ballyduff. * North Kerry Pastoral Area – Ballybunion Ballydonoghue Ballylongford Moyvane Tarbert. * Listowel Pastoral Area – Duagh Listowel Lixnaw. * Castleisland Pastoral Area – Ballymacelligott Brosna Castleisland Killeentierna Knocknagoshel. * Killarney Pastoral Area – Firies Fossa Glenflesk Kilcummin Killarney. * Killorglin Pastoral Area – Beaufort Castlemaine Glenbeigh Killorglin Milltown. * Iveragh Pastoral Area – Ballinskelligs Cahersiveen Caherdaniel Valentia Waterville. * Kenmare Pastoral Area – Glengarriff Kenmare Kilgarvan Sneem Tuosist. * Beara Pastoral Area – Adrigole Allihies Castletownbere Eyeries. * Millstreet Pastoral Area – Ballydesmond Boherbue Dromtarriffe Millstreet Rathmore. ==References== ==External links== * Diocese of Kerry. title: Roman Catholic Diocese of Kerry
